page.title: 02GOYTRE VILLAGE CARNIVAL 1985
page.content: On Saturday 8th of June 1985, the people of {Goytre }held their annual carnival.The various activities began at 11.00pm. and continued until 5.00pm. {LIST OF EVENTS Wine and Cookery Competion. Assembly of Floats near the village green followed by judging . Crowning of Carnival Queen,then the procession around village. Carnival officially opened by Chief Constable John Over. Judging of Fancy Dress Competition. Presentation of awards by Carnival Queen. Exhibition of Breakdancing and Bodypopping. Budo Display by Gwent Budo Academy. Childrens' races. Tug of War Competition.
